name: Flying Sword
senses: keensense 60 ft. (can't sense beyond this radius)

actions.name: Slash
actions.desc: _Melee Weapon Attack:_ +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. _Hit:_ 5 (1d8+1) slashing damage.

bonus_actions.name: Whirling Blade (6 HP or Fewer)
bonus_actions.desc: The flying sword makes a Slash attack against a target it can sense within 5 feet of it.

special_abilities.name: Antimagic Susceptibility
special_abilities.desc: The sword is incapacitated while in the area of an antimagic field. If targeted by _dispel magic_, the sword must succeed on a CON save against the caster's spell save DC or fall unconscious for 1 minute.

special_abilities.name: Construct Nature
special_abilities.desc: The sword doesn't require air, food, drink, or sleep.

special_abilities.name: Construct Resilience
special_abilities.desc: The sword is immune to poison and psychic damage, and it is immune to exhaustion and the charmed, frightened, paralyzed, petrified, and poisoned conditions.

special_abilities.name: False Appearance
special_abilities.desc: While the sword remains motionless and isn't flying, it is indistinguishable from a normal sword.
